Product Name: Peugeot Antique Bistro 1874 Pepper Mill, 12cmPeugeot Antique Bistro 1874 Pepper Mill, 12cm
Item Description: Directly inspired by the iconic Z model from 1874, this special reissue combines woodwork and steel, in a celebration of the historic craftsmanship that made Peugeot renowned. Made in France Grind adjustment button: the tighter it is screwed, the finer the grind and vice versa Lifetime mechanism warranty Pepper Mill: for grinding black, white, green, red, and pink peppercorns (no more than 15% pink in a pepper blend) and coriander seeds up to 6mm in diameter. Do not grind salt in your pepper mill. Easily identify the differences between your classic bistro mills by looking for the printed P or S on the opposite side of the Peugeot logo.

Product Name: Peugeot Isen Long Pepper Mill, 16cmPeugeot Isen Long Pepper Mill, 16cm
Item Description: Here is the first Peugeot mill specifically designed for long pepper and large peppercorns. This manual wooden mill is the perfect instrument for fans of peppers from around the world, especially long pepper varieties. You will no longer need a mortar and pestle to grind your long pepper. The Isen Pepper Mill's oversized mechanism can now easily take and grind this type of elongated pepper.

Product Name: Peugeot Isen u'Select Pepper Mill with Crank Handle, 18cmPeugeot Isen u'Select Pepper Mill with Crank Handle, 18cm
Item Description: With the u’Select system allowing highly precise grinding adjustment and its contemporary ergonomic shiny metal handle, the Isen pepper mill revisits the lines of historic Peugeot mills, with a touch of modernity.

Product Name: Peugeot Daman Electric u'Select Salt & Pepper Mills Duo, 16cmPeugeot Daman Electric u'Select Salt & Pepper Mills Duo, 16cm
Item Description: With this set of electric mills, Peugeot is reinforcing its innovative streak to offer the ultimate in functionality, and focusing on the playful and intuitive use of its mills. The Daman electric mill operates at the touch of a button. Efficient and silent, just pressing the button once is all it takes to produce the perfect amount of salt or pepper. In addition, there is special lighting to help you to keep a close eye on the amount of spice being ground. The Daman electric salt and pepper mills are practical, as they can be operated with one hand while you're using the other to cook with. A Peugeot signature, the patented u'Select grind control system at the base of the mills gives a taste result that is beyond perfection. Moreover, for the salt mill, its Zirconia mechanism, an innovation from Peugeot Research and Development, delivers extremely fine Powdered Salt, offering the taste pleasure of salt while limiting the quantity used. Elegance and practicality are the keywords of this set of Peugeot mills. Why not add it to your wishlist or perhaps it would make a great gift for someone who loves cooking. Compact and ergonomic design Press the button on the top of the mill to activate it Transparent reservoir helps you identify the contents quickly Equipped with a light to help you check how much salt is being ground u'Select grind adjustment system with six predefined settings 5-year product warranty Pepper Mill: For grinding black, white, green and red pepper, pink peppercorns (no more than 15% in a pepper blend) and coriander seeds - Salt Mill : For grinding dry salt (rock salt) with a crystal size of less than or equal to 4 mm. Not suitable for use with sea salt, sea flakes or wet salt

Product Name: Peugeot Daman Electric u'Select Pepper Mill, 16cmPeugeot Daman Electric u'Select Pepper Mill, 16cm
Item Description: This 16cm u'Select Electric Pepper Mill features a beautiful iridescent black finish, which pairs perfectly with its stainless steel base. Practical and stylish, this mill is easy to use and adjust; simply select one of the six pre-defined grind settings on the base of the mill for a finer or coarser grind. Its modern, compact design blends seamlessly into any kitchen. Compact and ergonomic design A transparent reservoir helps you identify the contents quickly Equipped with a light to help you check how much pepper is being ground u'Select grinding mechanism with six predefined grind settings Lifetime mechanism warranty

Product Name: Peugeot Zeli Electric Pepper Mill, 14 cmPeugeot Zeli Electric Pepper Mill, 14 cm
Item Description: The Peugeot Zeli electric pepper mill offers a comfortable one-hand operation. Made of ABS, Zeli features a brushed stainless steel finish. Designed in France Lifetime mechanism warranty Classic Grinding Mechanism Use black, white or green peppercorns up to 6mm in size. Do not use salt in pepper mill.

Product Name: Peugeot Elis Sense u'Select Electric Salt & Pepper Mills Duo, 20cmPeugeot Elis Sense u'Select Electric Salt & Pepper Mills Duo, 20cm
Item Description: The Elis Sense duo of electric mills is made for lovers of technology and beautiful objects. A classy design composed of stainless steel and acrylic. A genuine innovation, simply touch the body and head of the mill at the same time to activate it. The mill then supplies exactly the right dose of salt or pepper. A light illuminates during use. Equipped with the Peugeot mechanism, ultra-resistant with proven performance, it guarantees perfect longevity. The u’Select patented grind control system allows for precise adjustment of coarseness as required. Six dimensions of pepper or salt are available. The salt and pepper mills that form this duo are accompanied by a container of black pepper and dry salt crystals and a duo base. With Peugeot, innovation is always in the service of the useful and enjoyable! To be offered all the time.

Product Name: Peugeot Line Night Electric Zirlion u'Select Salt & Pepper Mill Gift Set, 15cmPeugeot Line Night Electric Zirlion u'Select Salt & Pepper Mill Gift Set, 15cm
Item Description: Whether you decide to give it as a gift to your loved ones who appreciate design and fine dining, or to add it to your own wishlist, the Night Electric gift set is sure to be a hit. This stylish set includes a 15 cm Peugeot Line Electric Matte Black Pepper Mill, and a 15cm Peugeot Line Electric Matte Black Salt Mill. Features: Optimised filling thanks to the funnel-shaped reservoir Compact design and striated body for optimum grip Latest-generation Li-ion battery, long battery life and short charging time u'Select grind adjustment system with six predefined grind settings Each mechanism is backed by a lifetime mechanism warranty Pepper mill: for grinding black, white, green and red pepper, pink peppercorns (no more than 15% in a pepper blend) and coriander seeds Salt mill: for grinding dry salt (rock salt) with a crystal size of less than or equal to 4 mm; do not use wet sea salt (even dried). The perfect gift for any occasion, from Christmas and birthdays to housewarmings, Mother's Day and Father's Day.

Product Name: Peugeot Line Electric Pepper Mill, 15cmPeugeot Line Electric Pepper Mill, 15cm
Item Description: The Line electric mill, with its compact design and striated body, offers optimum grip for intuitive use in the kitchen. This ingenious item is easy to open and the reservoir is funnel-shaped to optimise the filling process. Precise u’Select adjustment is the perfect finishing touch. Using the adjustment ring at the base of the mill you can select your setting, from 1 to 6, to guarantee even grinding for whichever size you choose, to suit every taste. The Line electric mill is already proving to be the perfect gift for any occasion. Optimized filling thanks to the funnel-shaped reservoir Compact design and striated body for optimum grip Latest-generation Li-ion battery, long battery life and short charging time u'Select grind adjustment with six predefined grind settings Mechanism with a lifetime warranty Five-year warranty for the mill For grinding black, white, green and red pepper, pink peppercorns (no more than 15% in a pepper blend) and coriander seeds Original gift idea

Product Name: Peugeot Paris Prestige Pepper Mill, 110cmPeugeot Paris Prestige Pepper Mill, 110cm
Item Description: The Peugeot Paris Prestige pepper mill is a remarkable piece. Its complete refinement marks two centuries of Peugeot history. Its height of 1 metre 10 cm makes it a powerfully beautiful giant pepper mill. The body and head are produced from a single piece of solid wood, in tribute to the region where Peugeot originated, the Franche-Comté. Functional, it is equipped with a grind control knob located on the head to adjust pepper grinding, and a pepper mechanism that comes with a lifetime guarantee. With a black lacquer finish, the Paris Prestige pepper mill is the epitome of poise. The logo, sculpted in metal, alludes to Peugeot’s two hundred year history, the rolling of steel. The shiny metal plinth offers a magnificent base. Finally the metal cup, covering the pepper mill, gives the final touch. This unique pepper mill has its own number, as one of a limited edition, accompanied by its certificate of authenticity.
